mean_cn: vt. 误传；  vi. 作虚假陈述
mean_en: to describe (someone or something) in a false way especially in order to deceive someone :to give someone a false idea about (something or someone)
sentence: The newspaper misrepresented him as arrogant for not standing up, but he was just injured.
sentence_trans: 报纸误传他不站起来是态度傲慢，但事实上他只是受了伤。
